projects.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Enterprise analytics platform serving 500k+ active users with real-time data visualization
projects.longDescription: Led the development of a comprehensive analytics platform that processes millions of events daily. Implemented custom chart library, real-time WebSocket updates, and advanced filtering capabilities. The platform reduced decision-making time by 60% for executive teams.
projects.contribution: Architected frontend infrastructure, implemented 20+ custom chart components, established design system, mentored 3 junior developers

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Scalable e-commerce solution handling 50k+ daily transactions
projects.longDescription: Built a high-performance e-commerce platform from scratch using Next.js and microservices architecture. Implemented advanced caching strategies, optimistic UI updates, and seamless payment integration with multiple providers.
projects.contribution: Designed system architecture, implemented checkout flow, integrated payment gateways, optimized for Core Web Vitals

projects.title: Component Design System
projects.description: Comprehensive design system powering 4 production applications
projects.longDescription: Created a scalable design system with 50+ reusable components, comprehensive documentation, and automated visual regression testing. Reduced development time by 40% across teams.
projects.contribution: Architected component library, established design tokens, created documentation site, implemented Storybook

projects.title: Microservices Migration
projects.description: Migrated monolithic application to microservices, reducing API latency by 60%
projects.longDescription: Led the architectural transformation from a monolithic Node.js application to a distributed microservices architecture. Implemented service mesh, API gateway, and comprehensive monitoring.
projects.contribution: Designed microservices architecture, implemented API gateway, set up Kubernetes cluster, established monitoring

projects.title: ML Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Personalized recommendation system increasing user engagement by 45%
projects.longDescription: Built a machine learning-powered recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and content-based algorithms. Integrated with existing platform to provide real-time personalized suggestions.
projects.contribution: Implemented recommendation algorithms, built data pipeline, created A/B testing framework, deployed ML models

projects.title: DevOps Automation Suite
projects.description: CI/CD pipeline automation reducing deployment time from hours to minutes
projects.longDescription: Developed comprehensive DevOps automation tools including infrastructure as code, automated testing pipelines, and deployment orchestration. Enabled team to deploy 10x more frequently with higher confidence.
projects.contribution: Built CI/CD pipelines, implemented infrastructure as code, created monitoring dashboards, automated security scanning
